4da73e5f-f0b4-4592-a894-bc9c88f4d695.name: string
4da73e5f-f0b4-4592-a894-bc9c88f4d695.description:
Receives the string to split by lines.

Example:
"line1
line2
line3"

677bc814-75c3-4960-a99e-e1a1fd174a46.name: lines
677bc814-75c3-4960-a99e-e1a1fd174a46.description:
Emits the array of lines.

Example:
["line1","line2","line3"]

name: string/Line splitter
description:
Splits a string by lines.

Example:
1. 'string' receives 
"line1
line2
line3"
2. 'lines' emits
["line1","line2","line3"]
